title: The Next Generation
description: Not currently available.Spin-off to the Conversion Trilogy.Nika and Julian Adams have a lot of secrets. But that's to be expected when you're a "little bit" vampire. When you're a supernatural being that is emotionally bonded to your twin, fitting in can be a little challenging. But these sixteen-year-old siblings are determined to find their place in the world...even if it kills them.
author: S.C. Stephens
